Desc.entry: Helps with arrears of water rates for people suffering financial hardship. Paid as a grant. On receipt of a completed application form, the Community Trust can co-ordinate the suspension of any debt recovery action Yorkshire Water may be planning to take against a customer for non-payment of water charges, pending a decision by the Trustees. A registered charity. Self or any referral.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 8.30am-5pm (office times); Quarterly (Mar, Jun, Sep & Dec, Trustees Meeting)
